docs.snippet: Members of a group in upstate New York spend time with miniature donkeys, looking to gain confidence or a sense of calm....
docs.lead_paragraph: Members of a group in upstate New York spend time with miniature donkeys, looking to gain confidence or a sense of calm.
docs.abstract: Andy Newman Pet City column on Steve Stiert, Ulster Park, NY, resident who raises herd of miniature donkeys as therapy animals; Stiert says their gentle and independent nature helped him reach calmer state of mind after several personal setbacks; his nonprofit brings donkeys to nursing homes and schools around Hudson River Valley region, but also holds gatherings in his own backyard, known as Donkey Park.
